description: Delay variables

context.name: delay
context.value:
(
    instant: $delay-base + $delay-step * 0,
    fast: $delay-base + $delay-step * 1,
    med-fast: $delay-base + $delay-step * 2,
    default: $delay-base + $delay-step * 3,
    med-slow: $delay-base + $delay-step * 4,
    slow: $delay-base + $delay-step * 5
)

property.name: $delay.instant
property.description: Instant: the quickest delay; close or equal to 0

description: Generates a property with a fluid value between specified screen sizes

context.name: fluid

parameter.name: prop
parameter.description: the property whose value will be fluid

parameter.name: min-vw
parameter.description: the minimum screen width of the fluid property

parameter.name: max-vw
parameter.description: the maximum screen width of the fluid property

parameter.name: min-size
parameter.description: the minimum value of the fluid property

parameter.name: max-size
parameter.description: the maximum value of the fluid property

output: the definitions for the property at different screen sizes
throw: The fluid mixin requires a string for the $prop argument.
The fluid mixin requires numbers for the width and size arguments.
The fluid mixin requires width and size arguments with the same units.
